graphics.opengl
Class Actor

java.lang.Object
  graphics.opengl.Actor
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLRenderableObject, JSONSerializable
public class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
implements JSONSerializable, GLRenderableObject

A class used to graphically represent a game character. It's made up by a set of animations that are used to represent different states.

Author:
Barber
